    • Constructor Detail

      • Steve

        public Steve​(com.pauliankline.floopyconnector.GameBoard gameboard,
             java.awt.Point location)
        This is the constructor for the Steve class. It creates a man Steve object and sets the name, type, and color of the Steve as well as the maxHP, maxDamage, and inventorySize. This also passes along the game board and hero location to the superclass.
        Parameters:
        gameboard - the game board.
        location - the Steve current location.

      • gameTickAction

        public void gameTickAction​(long l)
        This method handles all actions that need to be taken during game ticks. This method is the brains of the hero action options. Depending on if the hero is currently in battle or not, this method handles all actions from picking up items and using items to moving the hero around the board. This method also delegates the battle sequences and all game tick game logic.
        Specified by:
        gameTickAction in class com.pauliankline.floopyconnector.BaseHero
        Parameters:
        l - the game tick

      • die

        protected void die()
        This method removes the hero from the game board if they are dead.
        Specified by:
        die in class com.pauliankline.floopyconnector.BaseHero

        public boolean isDead()
        This method checks the heroes health and if the heroes HP <= 0 then it calls die().
